   17: -module(cluster_commands_SUITE).
   18: -compile(export_all).
   19: 
   20: -import(distributed_helper, [add_node_to_cluster/1,
   21:                              remove_node_from_cluster/1,
   22:                              is_sm_distributed/0, verify_result/1]).
   23: -import(ejabberdctl_helper, [ejabberdctl/3, rpc_call/3]).
   24: 
   25: 
   26: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   27: 
   28: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   29: %% Suite configuration
   30: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   31: 
   32: all() ->
   33:     [{group, clustered},
   34:      {group, ejabberdctl},
   35:       {group, clustering}].
   36: 
   37: groups() ->
   38:     [{clustered, [], [one_to_one_message]},
   39:       {clustering, [], [join_successful, leave_successful,
   40:         join_unsuccessful, leave_unsuccessful]},
   41:       {ejabberdctl, [], [set_master_test]}].
   42: 
   43: suite() ->
   44:     escalus:suite().
   45: 
   46: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   47: %% Init & teardown
   48: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   49: 
   50: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   51:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_suite(Config),
   52:     Node = ct:get_config(ejabberd2_node),
   53:     Config2 = ejabberd_node_utils:init(Node, Config1),
   54:     ejabberd_node_utils:backup_config_file(Node, Config2),
   55:     MainDomain = ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
   56:     Ch = [{hosts, "[\"" ++ binary_to_list(MainDomain) ++ "\"]"}],
   57:     ejabberd_node_utils:modify_config_file(Node, "reltool_vars/node2_vars.config", Ch, Config2),
   58:     ejabberd_node_utils:call_ctl(Node, reload_local, Config2),
   59:     {ok, EjdWD} = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(file, get_cwd, []),
   60:     CtlPath = case filelib:is_file(EjdWD ++ "/bin/ejabberdctl") of
   61:                   true -> EjdWD ++ "/bin/ejabberdctl";
   62:                   false -> EjdWD ++ "/bin/mongooseimctl"
   63:               end,
   64:     escalus:init_per_suite([{ctl_path, CtlPath} | Config2]).
   65: 
   66: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   67:     Node = ct:get_config(ejabberd2_node),
   68:     ejabberd_node_utils:restore_config_file(Node, Config),
   69:     ejabberd_node_utils:restart_application(Node, ejabberd),
   70:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   71: 
   72: init_per_group(Group, Config) when Group == clustered orelse Group == ejabberdctl ->
   73:   Config1 = add_node_to_cluster(Config),
   74:   case is_sm_distributed() of
   75:         true ->
   76:             escalus:create_users(Config1, escalus:get_users([alice, clusterguy]));
   77:         {false, Backend} ->
   78:             ct:pal("Backend ~p doesn't support distributed tests", [Backend]),
   79:             remove_node_from_cluster(Config1),
   80:             {skip, nondistributed_sm}
   81:     end;
   82: 
   83: init_per_group(clustering, Config) ->
   84:   case is_sm_distributed() of
   85:     true ->
   86:       escalus:create_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, clusterguy]));
   87:     {false, Backend} ->
   88:       ct:pal("Backend ~p doesn't support distributed tests", [Backend]),
   89:       remove_node_from_cluster(Config),
   90:       {skip, nondistributed_sm}
   91:   end;
   92: 
   93: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   94:     escalus:create_users(Config).
   95: 
   96: end_per_group(Group, Config) when Group == clustered orelse Group == ejabberdctl ->
   97:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, clusterguy])),
   98:     remove_node_from_cluster(Config);
   99: 
  100: %% Users are gone after mnesia cleaning
  101: %% hence there is no need to delete them manually
  102: end_per_group(clustering, Config) ->
  103:   remove_node_from_cluster(Config),
  104:   ok;
  105: 
  106: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  107:     escalus:delete_users(Config).
  108: 
  109: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  110:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  111: 
  112: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  113:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  114: 
  115: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  116: %% Message tests
  117: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  118: 
  119: one_to_one_message(ConfigIn) ->
  120:     %% Given Alice connected to node one and ClusterGuy connected to node two
  121:     Metrics = [{[data, dist], [{recv_oct, '>'}, {send_oct, '>'}]}],
  122:     Config = [{mongoose_metrics, Metrics} | ConfigIn],
  123:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {clusterguy, 1}], fun(Alice, ClusterGuy) ->
  124:                 %% When Alice sends a message to ClusterGuy
  125:                 Msg1 = escalus_stanza:chat_to(ClusterGuy, <<"Hi!">>),
  126:                 escalus:send(Alice, Msg1),
  127:                 %% Then he receives it
  128:                 Stanza1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(ClusterGuy, 5000),
  129:                 escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Hi!">>], Stanza1),
  130: 
  131:                 %% When ClusterGuy sends a response
  132:                 Msg2 = escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Oh hi!">>),
  133:                 escalus:send(ClusterGuy, Msg2),
  134:                 %% Then Alice also receives it
  135:                 Stanza2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
  136:                 escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Oh hi!">>], Stanza2)
  137:         end).
  138: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  139: %% Ejabberdctl tests
  140: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  141: 
  142: set_master_test(ConfigIn) ->
  143:     TableName = passwd,
  144:     NodeList = nodes(),
  145:     ejabberdctl("set_master", ["self"], ConfigIn),
  146:     [MasterNode] = rpc_call(mnesia, table_info, [TableName, master_nodes]),
  147:     true = lists:member(MasterNode, NodeList),
  148:     RestNodesList = lists:delete(MasterNode, NodeList),
  149:     OtherNode = hd(RestNodesList),
  150:     ejabberdctl("set_master", [atom_to_list(OtherNode)], ConfigIn),
  151:     [OtherNode] = rpc_call(mnesia, table_info, [TableName, master_nodes]),
  152:     ejabberdctl("set_master", ["self"], ConfigIn),
  153:     [MasterNode] = rpc_call(mnesia, table_info, [TableName, master_nodes]).
  154: 
  155: join_successful(Config) ->
  156:   Node2 = ct:get_config(ejabberd2_node),
  157:   ejabberdctl_interactive("join_cluster", [atom_to_list(Node2)], "yes\n", Config),
  158:   verify_result(add).
  159: 
  160: leave_successful(Config) ->
  161:   ejabberdctl_interactive("leave_cluster", [], "yes\n",  Config),
  162:   verify_result(remove).
  163: 
  164: join_unsuccessful(Config) ->
  165:   ejabberdctl_interactive("join_cluster", [], "no\n",  Config),
  166:   verify_result(remove).
  167: 
  168: leave_unsuccessful(Config) ->
  169:   join_successful(Config),
  170:   ejabberdctl_interactive("leave_cluster", [], "no\n",  Config),
  171:   verify_result(add).
  172: 
  173: 
  174: 
  175: %% Helpers
  176: ejabberdctl_interactive(Cmd, Args, Response, Config) ->
  177:   CtlCmd = escalus_config:get_config(ctl_path, Config),
  178:   run_interactive(string:join([CtlCmd, Cmd | normalize_args(Args)], " "), Response).
  179: 
  180: normalize_args(Args) ->
  181:   lists:map(fun
  182:               (Arg) when is_binary(Arg) ->
  183:                 binary_to_list(Arg);
  184:               (Arg) when is_list(Arg) ->
  185:                 Arg
  186:             end, Args).
  187: 
  188: %% Long timeout for mnesia and ejabberd app restart
  189: run_interactive(Cmd, Response) ->
  190:   run_interactive(Cmd, Response, timer:seconds(30)).
  191: 
  192: run_interactive(Cmd, Response, Timeout) ->
  193:   Port = erlang:open_port({spawn, Cmd},[exit_status]),
  194:   %% respond to interactive question (yes/no)
  195:   Port ! {self(), {command, Response}},
  196:   loop(Port,[], Timeout).
  197: 
  198: loop(Port, Data, Timeout) ->
  199:   receive
  200:     {Port, {data, NewData}} -> loop(Port, Data++NewData, Timeout);
  201:     {Port, {exit_status, ExitStatus}} -> {Data, ExitStatus}
  202:   after Timeout ->
  203:     throw(timeout)
  204:   end.
  205:
